about_the_game:
Erotic fiction includes 48 beautiful female characters in skimpy revealing outfits ready for making erotic shows in your game. You can make them completely naked or partially dressed. You can manage them according to your wishes. You will give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom those cute girls will have sex today or what kind of erotic show they will make.

Discover what else can offer you this cool DLC and have a fun.

You can use all characters from Erotic fiction DLC as main character or as NPC.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can add new characters on scene and in the NPC menu you can give them commands.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC users can make the characters completely naked.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 17 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
